ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: 1. I stayed in bed for too long even though I had things to do.
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1; 2= A little; 3; 4= A lot; 5; 6= Completely

ElementDescription: 2. There were certain things I needed to do that I didn't do.
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1; 2= A little; 3; 4= A lot; 5; 6= Completely

ElementDescription: 3. I am content with the amount and types of things I did.
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1; 2= A little; 3; 4= A lot; 5; 6= Completely

ElementDescription: 4. I engaged in a wide and diverse array of activities.
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1; 2= A little; 3; 4= A lot; 5; 6= Completely

ElementDescription: 5. I made good decisions about what type of activities and/or situations I put myself in.
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1; 2= A little; 3; 4= A lot; 5; 6= Completely

ElementDescription: 6. I was active, but did not accomplish any of my goals for the day.
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1; 2= A little; 3; 4= A lot; 5; 6= Completely

ElementDescription: 7. I was an active person and accomplished the goals I set out to do.
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1; 2= A little; 3; 4= A lot; 5; 6= Completely

ElementDescription: 8. Most of what I did was to escape from or avoid something unpleasant.
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1; 2= A little; 3; 4= A lot; 5; 6= Completely

ElementDescription: 9. I did things to avoid feeling sadness or other painful emotions.
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1; 2= A little; 3; 4= A lot; 5; 6= Completely

ElementDescription: 10. I tried not to think about certain things.
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1; 2= A little; 3; 4= A lot; 5; 6= Completely

ElementDescription: 11. I did things even though they were hard because they fit in with my long-term goals for myself.
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1; 2= A little; 3; 4= A lot; 5; 6= Completely

ElementDescription: 12. I did something that was hard to do but it was worth it.
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1; 2= A little; 3; 4= A lot; 5; 6= Completely

ElementDescription: 13. I spent a long time thinking over and over about my problems.
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1; 2= A little; 3; 4= A lot; 5; 6= Completely

ElementDescription: 14. I kept trying to think of ways to solve a problem but never tried any of the solutions.
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1; 2= A little; 3; 4= A lot; 5; 6= Completely

ElementDescription: 15. I frequently spent time thinking about my past, people who have hurt me, mistakes I've made, and other bad things in my history.
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1; 2= A little; 3; 4= A lot; 5; 6= Completely

ElementDescription: 16. I did not see any of my friends.
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1; 2= A little; 3; 4= A lot; 5; 6= Completely

ElementDescription: 17. I was withdrawn and quiet, even around people I know well.
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1; 2= A little; 3; 4= A lot; 5; 6= Completely

ElementDescription: 18. I was not social, even though I had opportunities to be.
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1; 2= A little; 3; 4= A lot; 5; 6= Completely

ElementDescription: 19. I pushed people away with my negativity.
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1; 2= A little; 3; 4= A lot; 5; 6= Completely

ElementDescription: 20. I did things to cut myself off from other people.
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1; 2= A little; 3; 4= A lot; 5; 6= Completely

ElementDescription: 21. I took time off of work/school/chores/responsibilities simply because I was too tired or didn't feel like going in.
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1; 2= A little; 3; 4= A lot; 5; 6= Completely

ElementDescription: 22. My work/schoolwork/chores/responsibilities suffered because I was not as active as I needed to be.
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1; 2= A little; 3; 4= A lot; 5; 6= Completely

ElementDescription: 23. I structured my day's activities.
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1; 2= A little; 3; 4= A lot; 5; 6= Completely

ElementDescription: 24. I only engaged in activities that would distract me from feeling bad.
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1; 2= A little; 3; 4= A lot; 5; 6= Completely

ElementDescription: 25. I began to feel badly when others around me expressed negative feelings or experiences.
Notes: 0= Not at all; 1; 2= A little; 3; 4= A lot; 5; 6= Completely

ElementDescription: Activation score
Avoidance/Rumination score
Work/School Impairment score
Social Impairment score
Factor 5 score
BADS total score
Study; The code for each individual study
Notes: e.g., the name of the study in multi-grant collections

ElementDescription: Subject's Primary Language
date ended (today's date if still in progress)
Response Type
Notes: 0 = IP Address; 1 = Survey Preview; 2 = Survey Test; 4 = Imported; 8 = Spam; 9 = Survey Preview Spam; 12 = Imported Spam; 16 = Offline; 17 = Offline Survey Preview; 32 = EX; 40 = EX Spam; 48 = EX Offline;

ElementDescription: Progress
Trial 1 duration of task, seconds
Checks if completed
Notes: 0=No; 1=Yes; 2=Yes, lost; 3=Unverified

ElementDescription: Date record updated
External Data Reference
Training or randomized case
Notes: 1 = randomized; 2 = training; 3=randomized-control; 4=randomized-intervention; 5=concurrent cohort-intervention

ElementDescription: Form used/assessment name
Notes: e.g., Self-Report, Parent Form, Short Form, Revised Version

ElementDescription: Timepoint/visit label
Notes: e.g., Baseline, 6-Month Follow Up, Year 2; Morning, At Bedtime
